14313.title: One of your brothers

choices: Some "fancy" journey in the lower one for sure!
143131.content:
You were in an extremely state of panic, as the hot lake of wonton soup were slowly lifted in the air. Waves and waves of soup kept knocking you down into the oily soup, some of it got into your nose and it felt like lava were being pour into your lungs. You were frantically gasping for air and tried to keep your head away from the boiling soup. Then Tyler’s gigantic face soon approached you, like a Leviathan aiming for a boat. He didn’t seem to notice the tiny bug that was in his soup. “HEY!!! TYYYYYLLLLLLLLEEEEERRRR! HELP ME! I’M INSIDE THE BOWL! DON’T EAT ME!” you started to yelled as loud as you possibly could. But beside from hurting your throat, all of those yelling were futile. With your current size (which was somehow shrunk even smaller than before), he couldn’t possibly hear you, let alone sitting in a crowded restaurant. A mosquito wouldn’t be able to hear you. Hell, a mosquito would sound like an Apache Helicopter of one fly near you! Then suddenly, the bowl suddenly leaned toward. And right at the end of the bowl was the pink, wrinkly pair of puckering muscle masses that was Ty’s lips, acting like a mini maelstrom that suck every content left inside the glass bowl. You tried to remember all the lesson they taught about rip current at the sea, and how to escape that thing. Then you used all of the strength left inside your microscope body and swam as hard as you could. But the piping hot maelstrom soon proved itself to be too much of a challenge for you. Your arms and legs felt like they would break off your body at any moment. After merely 15 seconds of trying, the whirlpool defeated you, and your minuscule body was cleanly sucked into his awaiting mouth, along with some pieces of minced pork and scallion. His mouth was as big as a cavern, and was filled with his hot stinky breath mixed with the smell of the soup. His pearly white teeth was at least the size of a small cottage, which you could comfortably live in if you could somehow drilled a hole into one of them. And although he was literally drinking his soup, his teeth still chomping, crushing any pieces of meat left in the broth, which you tried to avoid as much as possible. And his pink, foot-ball-field-sized mass of lumpy muscle that was the tongue was still wiggling in the murky saliva-mixed soup, trying to take in all of the delicious taste of the soup, while mixing more saliva into it at the same time. Then the tongue began to rise and touch the bony palate. He was going to swallow. “TYLER NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!” you could only utter a small scream, before being forcefully pushed down the dark abyssal hole that was his throat, along with anything inside Tyler’s mouth, making a loud “GLURK” and creating an easily-seen lump that quickly traveled down his Adam’s apple toward his hungry belly.

The trip down his esophagus was quite fast, since he was swallowing a liquid rather than solid masses of chewed food. However, you could still feel the pressure made by his peristalsis. Then a sphincter open and you, along with the soup was “poured” into his stomach. The organ was so big that you swear you could fit your entire apartment inside and it still had spare space left. The wall was extremely wrinkly. It looked as if someone has peeled all the wrinkle existed in the world and made it into the inner lining of a fleshy bag (or in this case, a grand cavern). Half of his stomach’s volume was filled with a sea of hot wonton soup mixed with saliva, soda and stomach juice, with scattered pieces of chewed-up shrimp, pork and other unrecognizable food as coral reefs and some small floating pieces of scallion, creating a weird, creepy and utterly disgusting sight of an distorted world. Lucky for you, Tyler had accidentally swallow a small wonton meatball whole (apparently, his throat was big enough to swallow a small meatball with only mild discomfort) which would be your temporary accommodation for the time being. And the smell! Oh the smell! It was a mixture of vomit, saliva, meat and some traditional Chinese herbs, which didn’t help improve the overall smell much. The smell of those dirty lockers of the boys in your school was like flower scent compare to this horrible acidic smell. And that disgusting smell was further amplified with the scorching heat from both his belly and the steaming soup. How could he even swallow that steaming hot soup without getting burn? And the combination of the gurgling sound Tyler’s tummy made when it was churning and rippling its wall to digest his meal, his occasionally loud and obnoxious burps, his pounding heartbeats and some weird noise right below the stomach (which you didn’t have to guess to know what it was) served as a sadistic torture to your poor sensitive ears. If Hell ever existed, this stinky disgusting vomit cavern would be the deepest floor of Hell.

“Argh! I’m in his stomach now! How could he drank such hot soup without getting burn? At least he should have wait for it to cool down a little! Anyway, I need to get out of this place fast!” You began to take an overview of your fleshy prison. The top sphincter, which was your entrance was a little bit too high for you to reach, unless you could make those jumps like dolphins or salmons could. And at a corner at the bottom of the tummy laid another sphincter, completely sealed. You had learnt enough about the digestive system at school to know that it was the gateway that lead food to his small intestine, then the large intestine, and finally into the toilet. Those were the only available escape method for you at the moment. Either you wait for the opportunity to escape through his upper sphincter, with the risk of facing his powerful peristalsis and many other unexpected dangers (like his teeth, for example), or continue to stay in this hellish belly and wait for the lower sphincter, with the obvious outcome of becoming poop. Which would you choose?
143131.title: To the tummy you go!

1431312.content:
“No! I can’t give up! I rather be thrown out of this place than become his poop!” you grunt. From your position on the wonton island, you jumped as high as you could, aiming for the top sphincter. Obviously, you failed. Not giving up on your mile-high target, you tried again, and again, and again. After 30 jumps, all of which failed horribly (duh!) with the only outcome is that you had disrupted his tummy’s contents, which made Tyler burped more and nearly sunk your “lovely” island, you moved to a new strategy: climbing. You jumped off the meatball and swam through the sea of hot soup and stinky acid to the nearest wall of his belly. You grabbed the wrinkle then proceed to climbing the slimy wall of pure ugliness, using the squishy wrinkles as substitutions for climbing holds. You were good at indoor wall climbing, so to you, this was just like climbing a big, squishy and at the same time, more disgusting and acid-spilling wall. But when you thought nothing would happen, the stomach wall suddenly vibrated. It then emitted some weird grumbling sounds, as if Tyler had eaten an angry cat. You tried to hold on to the shaking wall, and after struggling for a while, you finally reached the closing sphincter. Suddenly, you heard a strange noise coming from behind the sphincter. Tyler was swallowing something. Then all of a sudden, the sphincter opened, and before you could even have the slightest reaction, a massive boulder of chewed food hit you in the face and knock you back to the disgusting sea, immediately followed by an avalanche of mushy Chinese food, with a cloudburst of lemon soda as the finishing touch. It was like the Apocalypse for you. After all of those cataclysm had passed, you rose from the bottom of the Wonton Sea (currently the Mash-up-thingy Sea), like a survivor of a sunken ship, tried to fill your lungs with as much air as possible, and started to regain your sanity. The scenery had been greatly altered. Your dear wonton island had sunk, rendered you homeless (or something like that), and the sea of already murky and smelly liquid had become even murkier, smellier and felt more condensed, like a muddy swarm of rotting food. The stomach had stretched out, and was currently about 1.5 time larger than its original size, as an effect of the sudden food rush. And as a result, the sphincter, in your perspective, was much higher than it had been. The mushy liquid made it nearly impossible for you to walk through or swim in. And if you managed to get to the wall, you would be too exhausted to climb up the now-higher wall. Suddenly, all of the stinky fume in the fleshy chamber rushed up, creating a loud burst that nearly knock you out for its intense loudness. It was the loudest burst you had ever heard, and with your millimeter-high body, it felt like a nuclear bombing that happened right next to you. After some few more aftershocks, the stomach wall began to constrict. Pale-greenish slimy acid started to seep out from the wall, alerting the beginning of the digestion process. “DANG IT!!!!! IF ONLY HE HAD BURPED A LITTLE BIT EARLIER, I COULD HAVE ESCAPED!” you yelled, angry at the failure of your plan. But there were literally nothing you could have done to save yourself, and being angry wouldn’t make the situation become any better. “Welp! It’s my fate now, being my older bro’s poop! At least I would have an adventure in the next few hours! Not a good one, but still an adventure.” You sighed, regaining your calmness and floated in the chaotic tummy, waiting for the inevitable fate waiting behind the bottom sphincter.

“Aaaaaaahhhhh! This wonton soup is soooooooooooooo good! I would order one more dish of Char Siu, and after that we will go to the arcade at 5th floor!” Tyler happily said while reaching his hand at the glass of lemon soda and chugged it like he had just escaped from the Sahara desert. He hadn’t eaten at this place for a long time, and this was the first time in the month that he had had such a delicious meal. Tyler was that kind of sporty boy who ate a lot and would get involved in any sport-related event at school. He didn’t normally do well at school, with B+ as the highest mark he had ever got. But when it came to sports, especially football (or soccer for you American), he would be the Ace. Suddenly, he felt some tingling inside his body. “Hey! Something just tickled my belly! Weird!” he said. “The Chinese food in your stomach are revolting because you drank soda instead of the herbal tea they offered before! It aids digestion, you know!” said Adam. “Soon they would force you to throw them out to their freedom! Hahaha!” he made a rare (and weird) smile, before turning back to his serious face. “Shut up! There’s nothing funny in what you said! I am older, so I drink what I want!” Tyler hissed back at his brother, while using his had to rub his belly. “I must be hungry! If I eat more, it would help.” Tyler said. “Sure! The magic of food would help to stop the weird tickles in you big belly! Sure, why not?” Adam sarcastically said. Despite being the youngest brother in the family, Adam was significantly smarter and more mature than both you and Tyler. While you and big bro are the energetic hothead who shared a room, he was the type of person who always has that deadpan serious face that scared even the toughest bully, and only laugh at the weirdest things ever (or things that are too intelligent for both of you to understand). He got those traits from his mother, and like her, would prefer staying in his own room doing weird researches on his computer, or in the library reading all kinds of encyclopedia. Because of that, he didn’t get along well with his brothers much. This was one of the rare occasion when he agreed to go out with you guys. Five minutes later, as soon as the waiter brought out the dish of char siu, Tyler dug in, and quickly finished the dish in 90 seconds. “Aaaaaah! So good! That would handle the itching! See Adam, I told you it will work!” Ty said and made a smug face at his younger bro. “Whatever! Now hurry up to the arcade! I have homework to finish!” Adam complained. “Wait...!” Tyler suddenly stopped. A grumbling sound emitted from his full belly, showing a part of his belly button. “BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!” he then released all of the pressure in his tummy, making the loudest burp Adam had ever heard. “That hits the spot! Now, to the arcade we go!” Tyler said, then happily skipping to the escalator. “Disgusting!” Adam said, before slowly made his way to his hyperactive brother. Neither of them had even acknowledged about their disappeared brother, who was uncomfortably lying behind the wall of skin, flesh (and fat) of Tyler’s abdomen, inside his big tummy.

It had been about 2 hours and a half. Most of the food in Tyler’s belly had already been digested. And surprisingly, in the chaotic scenery of the stomach, you were still awake, tired and bored. Well, the massive amount of noise and the churning of the “hell cave” barely gave you any moment to rest. Then suddenly, the sphincter at the bottom opened, and all of the mush including you were suck in and move to the next destination of food’s journey – Tyler’s duodenum and small intestine. The gigantic cavern was replace by a smaller tunnel, which was still humongous compare to you. A weird liquid was shot out from the wall of his gut, somehow liquefied your prison a little bit and allowed more movement for you. There were millions of villi on the intestine’s wall, each of them was ten time longer than you. They were swinging wildly in the murky mush like a swarm of hungry sea serpents, grabbing any piece of nutrition available. And you though the stomach was the weirdest place ever! “Dang! This place is weird!” you exclaimed the obvious. “At least it is more peaceful than that hell of a stomach!” you sighed. You were right, though. Compare to the stomach, the small intestine was much better. There were no noise, less smell, no sudden burps, and the organ wasn’t try to make a milkshake with you. Everything was moving slowly, like, extremely slowly, maybe for maximum nutrition absorption. Having been too tired from all of the mayhem in your big bro’s tummy, you soon dozed off, while peacefully floating along with the river of mush that was slowly moving through his mile-long coil of gut.

So what will happen? What’s next? You decide! *insert fancy battle music*

14313123.content:
Ever since your entrance into your brother’s smelly gut, you had always thought of it as a more peaceful and much longer version of the stomach, which tried every way possible to kill you. And in fact, it truly is more peaceful, well, at least for the first 20 minutes. Then everything changed when the villi nation attacked. At first, they were just like some kind of big, fat worms, trying to tickle you to see if you were food, which kinda made your sleep somehow more comfortable. Then as you drifted further and further into Ty’s coiled intestine, they soon showed their true form as vicious (and fat) serpents with a humongous appetite for teeny tiny pieces of food, such as you. The first villus to attack you woke you up instantly with a sharp pain in a nearly dislocated shoulder join. Right after you managed to stop it with a punch, others soon latched into your legs, your arms and any other exposed part of your body. One even tried to suck your head. Such a smart intestine for a bumbling (but likeable) idiot like your big bro. Luckily, you managed to escape from their grips but was stricken with fatigues and exhaustion. You knew for some unknown reasons, you were kinda “nearly immortal”, but not totally immune to such physical injuries. But if there was anything you knew, those injuries would heal, soon or late, thanks to some fancy magic stuff that had also shrunk you.

The villi, however bad they were, weren’t the only problem in Tyler’s small intestine. The liquefied food, having been neutralized by the stomach acid, wasn’t as stingy as before. But then came the bile. As if the digested food wasn’t smelly enough from the stomach’s work, Ty’s little gut decided to squirt like gallons and gallons of stinky and disgusting bile (you knew that came from some tiny organ near his liver). You struggled to cover your nose from the even more terrible smell, but then some of the bile got into your mouth and made you question why you even opened your dang mouth in this place. The bile was extremely bitter, more than any kind of food or medicine you have ever eaten. Some drops managed to find their way into your stomach, and force you to violently vomit them out, along with anything left in your poor tiny belly. Some got into your nose and made you cough like an old man in his final stage of lung cancer. Another contributor to your misery was the quietness. The stomach was loud and annoying, but that annoyance was nothing compared to this. At the duodenum, and some first coils of the intestine, you could still hear the gurgling sound of Ty’s tummy digesting his next meal. But as you moved further in, everything became creepily quiet. The only sounds left was the slow beating of his heart and the pumping of blood in the blood vessels nearby, busy transporting nutrient to every corner of Ty’s body, to fuel him, and to make him grow healthily. That sound, combined with the seemingly endless length of Tyler’s intestine shattered your illusion about a near-perfect (at least in this condition) resting place and realized how hellish this place truly was. With every second passed, the bitterness in your mouth felt worse, the repetitive low-toned ambient noise became louder like countless war drums played at the same time, and you just felt more depressed. You didn’t want to complain, quite contradicted to your personality. It would just waste your time and your limited energy. Besides, he couldn’t hear you, so there was no need for complaints. You just wanted to get out. Fast.

In short, the intestine is bad. VERY, VERY BAD. Lucky for you, a miracle (everything that could get you out is a miracle) came just in time to save you. As you were drifting alone in the coiled gut, waiting for your grand escape, a villus grabbed you and quickly consumed you. You didn’t resist. You were too tired anyway. And maybe, this would lead to something better. So you let your tiny body dragged into the unimaginably tight tunnel. And it just getting tighter and tighter. You then passed into a slightly bigger chamber somewhere inside your brother’s vast anatomy, then quickly pushed into a slightly wider tunnel until finally dumped into a gigantic chamber. It was a little bit smaller than the stomach and had fewer wrinkles. The shape was more of an upside-down onion, with two sphincters on top, and a small one at the bottom. But worse of all, you were in a lake of some kind of golden liquid, which smelled worse than the boy’s toilet after a heavy PE class. “This disgusting smell! This warmness! Things seem very familiar here!” you thought. Then reality hit you. “I’M INSIDE HIS FREAKING BLADDER! OH MY FREAKING GOD! CAN THIS BECOME WORSE?" you screamed, realized the situation you were in. But after spending another 5 minutes to scream and whine, a light bulb appeared (figuratively) shone inside your head. “He can pee me outta here! That’s right! A little bit gross, but fine!” you cheered with yourself. “But how can I make him pee right now?” you wondered, trying to find a solution. Then suddenly, the floodgates on top of Tyler’s bladder opened, and two pillars of more golden water flooded in, causing the piss level to rise abruptly, turning the Golden Lake into the Golden Sea of Chaos, Madness and Stink (and also Piss). Fortunately, you were a pretty good swimmer, so you didn’t really have to worry much about drowning in this sea. You may die because of the smell, though. The surrounding had changed dramatically after the Golden Flood. Most of the wrinkles on the wall had disappeared, as the bladder was then filled with approximately 400ml of urine, near its maximum capacity (that boring biology class finally showed its usefulness). Tyler’s bladder was then as stretch out as a water balloon and looked like it could burst out any moment. This gave you another idea. Using all of your left strength, you swam at the nearest wall and started to tickle it. “Sorry Ty, but this is for my own good!” you said, then continued to tickle it more violently. The bladder began to shake, as it drastically sent messages alerting its master. “It’s working!!!!” you yelled. You then put your honour aside and dived into the deep liquid, heading to the valve at the bottom. Once you had reached it, you tried to push it, creating more pressure for Tyler to open his floodgate. Suddenly, the whole bladder trembled violently. Tyler was running. Your plan had succeeded. You could hear a loud slam of a door. He was in the toilet. Then the valve that you were next to open, creating a gigantic whirlpool of urine that quickly sucked you into his urethra. Light soon appeared before your bare eyes again. “FREEDOM, HERE I COME!!!” you screamed in excitement.

So, what would happen next?

info.description:
You are 9 year old Mark. You and your 2 brothers and best friend go to the mall to hang out for the day when you end up shrinking to 1 inch tall and need to find help.

Characters
Mark 9
Tyler 12
Adam 7
Jackson, best friend, 9
Mall Goers interaction age will be infant to 18,


Rules and please follow them :
All males
No interaction with anyone over 18 or females
Animals are fine
He is immune to death for the time being, might change later
NO ONE SENTENCE CHAPTERS, THESE WILL BE DELETED!!!
BE DESCRIPTIVE AND CREATIVE
All unaware interaction for right now, or they think he's a bug.

Gift points will be given for good chapters.
